author: Staff Reporter
text:
A group of social activists of 'New Deiva Hair Care Trust' performed a free hair dressing on 134 orphans staying in a children's home at Thirumuruganpoondi here on Friday.

N. Deivaraj, the managing trustee of the trust, said the hair cut was done to enable children wore an elegant look during Pongal.

The trust members had been involved in activities like free hair dressing and distribution of clothes to people staying in streets as well as in children's homes for the past many years, with expenditure met from their own financial resources.
title: Free hair cut for 134 orphans
